net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Image, Panel, TextField

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract parent class that is used for every Component. Holds the position, size, and parent of each Component. Also includes other things too.
    Since:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:24:21 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    Mar 10, 2013 at 12:24:21 AM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak
